web.branding.current_label_modelvalue_cl.en: Current {0}: {1}. Click to cycle through options.
web.branding.current_label_modelvalue_cl.translation: Trenutna {0}: {1}. Kliknite za kroženje po možnostih.

web.branding.preview_of_the_secret_link_.en: Preview of recipient's view when accessing your secure link
web.branding.preview_of_the_secret_link_.translation: Predogled pogleda prejemnika pri dostopu do vaše varne povezave

web.branding.example_pre_reveal_instruct.en: Use your phone to scan the QR code
web.branding.example_pre_reveal_instruct.translation: Uporabite telefon za skeniranje QR kode

web.branding.these_instructions_will_be_.en: These instructions will be shown to recipients before they reveal the secret content
web.branding.these_instructions_will_be_.translation: Ta navodila bodo prikazana prejemnikom, preden razkrijejo vsebino skrivnosti

web.branding.these_instructions_will_be_.en: These instructions will be shown to recipients after they reveal the secret
web.branding.these_instructions_will_be_.translation: Ta navodila bodo prikazana prejemnikom po tem, ko razkrijejo skrivnost

web.branding.click_to_upload_a_logo_with.en: Click to upload a logo. Recommended size: 128x128 pixels. Maximum file size: 1MB. Supported formats: PNG, JPG, SVG
web.branding.click_to_upload_a_logo_with.translation: Kliknite za nalaganje logotipa. Priporočena velikost: 128x128 slikovnih točk. Največja velikost datoteke: 1MB. Podprti formati: PNG, JPG, SVG

web.branding.preview_how_recipients_will.en: Preview how recipients will see your secrets by testing the "View Secret" button
web.branding.preview_how_recipients_will.translation: Predoglejte, kako bodo prejemniki videli vaše skrivnosti, s testiranjem gumba "Prikaži skrivnost"

web.branding.click_the_preview_image_bel.en: Click the preview image below to update your logo (minimum 128x128 pixels recommended, 1MB max)
web.branding.click_the_preview_image_bel.translation: Kliknite spodnjo sliko predogleda za posodobitev logotipa (priporočeno najmanj 128x128 slikovnih točk, največ 1MB)

web.branding.use_the_controls_above_to_c.en: Use the controls above to customize brand color, styles, and recipient instructions
web.branding.use_the_controls_above_to_c.translation: Uporabite zgornje kontrole za prilagoditev barve blagovne znamke, slogov in navodil prejemnikom

web.branding.you_have_unsaved_changes_ar.en: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure?
web.branding.you_have_unsaved_changes_ar.translation: Imate neshranjene spremembe. Ali ste prepričani?

web.branding.failed_to_load_brand_settin.translation: Nalaganje nastavitev blagovne znamke ni uspelo

web.branding.this_is_an_interactive_prev.en: This is an interactive preview of how recipients will see your secure messages. You can: - Customize colors and fonts using the controls above - Upload a logo (minimum 128x128 pixels recommended, 1MB max) - Test the preview using the "View Secret" button
web.branding.this_is_an_interactive_prev.translation: To je interaktiven predogled tega, kako bodo prejemniki videli vaša varna sporočila. Lahko: - Prilagodite barve in pisave z zgornjimi kontrolami - Naložite logotip (priporočeno najmanj 128x128 slikovnih točk, največ 1MB) - Testirajte predogled z gumbom "Prikaži skrivnost"

web.branding.this_is_an_interactive_prev.en: This is an interactive preview of how recipients will see your secure messages. You can: - Customize colors and fonts using the controls above - Upload a logo (minimum 128x128 pixels recommended, 1MB max) - Test the preview using the "View Secret" button
web.branding.this_is_an_interactive_prev.translation: To je interaktiven predogled tega, kako bodo prejemniki videli vaša varna sporočila. Lahko: - Prilagodite barve in pisave z zgornjimi kontrolami - Naložite logotip (priporočeno najmanj 128x128 slikovnih točk, največ 1MB) - Testirajte predogled z gumbom "Prikaži skrivnost"
